Warning

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

OS/2

version

OS/2 table version should be 4.

OS/2 table version is '3' but should be 4. Please verify agains job spec.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which chould be made from components (in many cases).
Please investigate and approve if correct.

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

CFF

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

CFF

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'U+FEFF' (uniFEFF) (ID 1) = '0'.
'U+0300' (uni0300) (ID 316) = '0'.
'U+0301' (uni0301) (ID 317) = '0'.
'U+0303' (uni0303) (ID 318) = '0'.
'U+0309' (uni0309) (ID 319) = '0'.
'U+0323' (uni0323) (ID 320) = '0'.
'U+007F' (uni007F) (ID 541) = '0'.

'U+0300' (uni0300) (ID 316) = '0'.
'U+0301' (uni0301) (ID 317) = '0'.
'U+0303' (uni0303) (ID 318) = '0'.
'U+0309' (uni0309) (ID 319) = '0'.
'U+0323' (uni0323) (ID 320) = '0'.
'U+007F' (uni007F) (ID 541) = '0'.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

STAT

static font

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

static font

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+0000

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'ArialNovaCond-Light'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed Light' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

MS is: 'Monotype Design Office'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arial Nova'

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '25'
'ArialNovaCond-LightItalic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

name

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed Light Italic' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond Light Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'ArialNovaCond'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '15'
'Arial Nova Cond'

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'ArialNovaCond'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Regular (ArialNovaCond.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond' (NID 1).

Pass

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. Mac NID 1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Arial Nova Cond'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

OK: NID 2 is 'Italic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '22'
'Arial Nova Cond Italic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Arial Nova Cond Italic' = NID 1 'Arial Nova Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Sm, Dm, Xtra, Semi, X, Ultra, Ex, Demi'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Arial Nova Cond Italic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.05;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.05'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'ArialNovaCond-Italic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

OK: NID 1 length is '15'
'Arial Nova Cond'

name

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. name

MS NID 14

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed Italic' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Error

Arial Nova Cond Italic (ArialNovaCond-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arial Nova'

Error

name

Macintosh NID 17 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (Mac/Roman/English)

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Arial Nova Cond'

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Sm, Dm, Xtra, Semi, X, Ultra, Ex, Demi'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Arial Nova Cond'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Arial Nova Cond Bold' = NID 1 'Arial Nova Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.05;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.05'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'ArialNovaCond-Bold'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. name

MS NID 14

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed Bold' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'
MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

MS is: 'Arial Nova Cond'

name

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
MS is: 'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 8

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'
MS is: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'

Pass

MS is: 'Monotype Design Office'

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Error

Entries are different.

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arial Nova'

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BoldItalic'

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Trademark is:
'Arial is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but should be (because trademark is registered)
'Arial is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and may be registered in certain other jurisdictions.'.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Arial Nova Condensed Bold Italic' ≠ 'Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 16

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Arial Nova'

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-205'.
underlineThicknes is '102'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Warning

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Warning

Arial Nova Cond Light Italic (ArialNovaCond-LightItalic.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Pass

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Error

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1922) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 2011
hhea.descent: -466
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1922) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Monotype standard for gasp table.

gasp subtable '8' is
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'
equal to MT standard
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'

Pass

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold (ArialNovaCond-Bold.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Monotype standard for gasp table.

gasp subtable '8' is
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'
equal to MT standard
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Arial Nova Cond Bold Italic (ArialNovaCond-BoldItalic.ttf)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

lowestRecPPEM

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'
equal to MT standard

PostScript names

PostScript names

Info

Arial Nova Cond Light Regular (ArialNovaCond-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Font has no PostScript names.
